discourse_list.title: [Council of Paris] Content, Experiences and Feedback

content.content: The Council of Paris happened March 4th, 2019, in Paris, co-located with ETHCC. Use this wiki and comment thread to share your experiences, give feedback, and link to the content and outcomes created from the event. The Call for Rings Wiki has all other relevant links from the event.  Experiences Any anecdotes, experiences or “ah ha!” moments you had In the Meta Magicians Ring, Elias proposed the word “steward” as the label for people who take responsibility for a ring. This simple label that captures care & facilitation without ownership felt right to me. We went further to start discussion about having 2 stewards per Ring, and expecting a level of responsibility. — @boris  add another experience Feedback The good, bad, and ugly. What worked for you? What didn’t work? What would you like to see from future EthMagicians gatherings Content From tweets to blog posts, what great content was created? Share it    Medium – 4 Mar 19    Q + A on ETH 2.0 – The Fellowship of Ethereum Magicians – Medium Serenity session at ETHMagicians: Paris 2019 Reading time: 13 min read         twitter.com          Zak Cole (0xzak)     A wizard is never late.  4:00 AM - 4 Mar 2019     6          1              twitter.com          Lane Rettig (lrettig)     I am genuinely too drained mentally and physically to share "takeaways" from the @EthMagicians #CouncilOfParis yesterday but I was blown away by the turnout, the level of engagement, and the depth of conversation on a variety of topics. Instead, here are some pics! 🤓  1:57 AM - 5 Mar 2019     8          1
